name: consultrade srl
goal:
Aiutiamo le imprese Europee, organizzazioni, pubbliche istituzioni, università ed enti di formazione, nella ricerca e perseguimento, delle politiche europee, nei settori di riferimento: Horizon2020, Creative Europe, SME Instruments, INTERRAG, ERASMUS+, LIFE+, Bando Life.
---------------------------------------------------------------
Consultrade helps European companies, organizations, public institutions, universities and training bodies to search and pursuit European policies in the specific business areas :Horizon2020, Creative Europe, SME Instruments, INTERRAG, ERASMUS+, LIFE+, LIFE Programme.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Studio, perseguimento ed implementazione delle azioni relative ai seguenti programmi: Horizon2020, Creative Europe, SME Instruments, INTERRAG, ERASMUS+, LIFE+, Bando Life.
------------------------------------------------------------------
Study, pursuit and implementation of the operations relating to the following programs: Horizon2020, Creative Europe, SME Instruments, INTERRAG, ERASMUS+, LIFE+, Bando Life.
